name: Not So Quick Draw
description:
Not So Quick Draw

Submission for TriJam #176 - Loading Process

Can you figure out how to reload your gun to shoot all targets before time runs out?

Controls:

  • H : Switch Hammer Position.
  • L: Latch/Unlatch Barrel.
  • Shake Mouse: Swing Barrel Open/Close.
  • R:  Load Round into Barrel.
  •  B: Rotate Barrel selected Round.
  • Right Click: Start Aiming.
  • Left Click: Shoot

Development Time: 2 hours 52 min.

I unfortunately ran out of time before being able to add sound, so this will have to do for now.
